  prototype={<>LLVMBool LLVMTargetMachineEmitToFile (<a href="#ga2fd34441d1fdf9466981c6c95caea314">LLVMTargetMachineRef</a> T, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gad1d1bb5f901c903a0cf09c5a053c9c56">LLVMModuleRef</a> M, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; Filename, <a href="#ga001bfa8b65c06272b3449a256c961487">LLVMCodeGenFileType</a> codegen, char &#42;&#42; ErrorMessage)</>}>
Emits an asm or object file for the given module to the filename.

This wraps several c++ only classes (among them a file stream). Returns any error in ErrorMessage. Use LLVMDisposeMessage to dispose the message.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/targetmachine-h/#l00209">209</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/targetmachine-h">TargetMachine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/targetmachinec-cpp/#l00324">324</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/targetmachinec-cpp">TargetMachineC.cpp</a>.
